name: WiX Project File
summary: Learn about .WIXPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A simple way to create a WIXPROJ file is to type, "msbuild projectfile.wixproj" at the command line (where "projectfile" is the name of the project file). If WiX has been installed, Visual Studio will create a standard msbuild project file. WIXPROJ files can also be created and edited using a text editor.
NOTE: Every WIXPROJ file is accompanied by at least one .WXS file.

description: File created by the WiX toolset, a Windows installer development program; contains elements such as <Configuration>, <ProductVersion>, <OutputName>, and <OutputPath> necessary to create a .MSI (Windows Installer package) file using the WiX Toolset.
